About me

aleron75

Alessandro Ronchi

I work at Bitbull as experienced Magento specialist, devoted to software design, backend development and training.
I'm the author of Magento Best Practices Handbook and active contributor to open source Magento extensions and resources.
I also love taking part in the #realmagento community as speaker and conference organizer.

GitHub: aleron75
Twitter: @aleron75
